text: ad (namæti janatava nam) bhumiyehi asadharanaye ahamkara vi “apata vada saktivantayin kavurunda?”yi pævasuha. ovunva utpadanaya kala allah niyata vasayenma ovunta vada balasampannayeki yanna ovun avadhanaya kara bæluve nædda? (ehet) ovun apage (mevæni) sadhakayanda, (tarka kara) pratiksepa karaminma sitiyaha
